articles.title: John Amos, actor in groundbreaking TV roles, dies at 84 - The Washington Post
articles.description: He played the stoic patriarch in “Good Times” and the adult Kunta Kinte in the miniseries “Roots.” He was also a fast-food entrepreneur in “Coming to America.”
articles.content: John Amos, a running back turned actor who appeared in scores of TV shows including groundbreaking 1970s programs such as the sitcom Good Times and the epic miniseries Roots and risked his career to … [+10559 chars]

articles.title: Breast cancer rising among younger women at ‘troubling’ rate: report - New York Post
articles.description: From 2012 to 2021, the incidence rate increased 1.4% annually among women younger than 50, 2.5% among Asian American women and 2.7% among Pacific Islander women.
articles.content:
The breast cancer death rate continues to decline among US women, a new American Cancer Society report finds, but diagnoses are becoming more common among younger women.
